title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman. Commissioner Jim Smith Reserve Deputy Status

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Reserve Deputy Status of Commissioner Jim Smith and location of the Reserve Deputy Status and law enforcement licensing held at MCSO. Dates of commencement of status as Reserve Deputy and current status.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell

title: McLennan County Administrator Dustin Chapman,  McNamara Shooting Range Agreement

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any agreements or contracts, any written queries or statements concerning the upkeep or use of the McNamara property known as the "Shooting Range". This is to include deputies cleaning or clearing, or mowing the "shooting range", plus storage of ATV's at the range. Any contracts between McLennan County and the McNamara family or Sheriff for use, upkeep, free or paid, of the shooting range. Also, any deputies who have volunteered or been paid to keep the shooting range grounds or McNamara yard.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Bernadette Feazell
